query:
ALTER TABLE notification_preferences 
ADD COLUMN digest_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE AFTER report_updates,
ADD COLUMN digest_frequency ENUM('daily', 'weekly') DEFAULT 'daily' AFTER digest_enabled,
ADD COLUMN last_digest_sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER digest_frequency;
